subtitle: 1.找出数组中重复的数字 1function findRepeatNum(Arr) { 2 let len = Arr.length; 3 let result = []; 4 let set = new Set(); 5 for(let i = 0; i < len; i++) { 6 let setSize = set.size; 7 set.add(Arr[i]); 8 if(setSize == set.size) { 9 result.push(Arr[i]); 10 } 11 } 12 return Array.from(new Set(result)); 13} 14console.log(findRepeatNum([1,32,3,5,6,2,2,3,5,6,7])); //[ 2, 3, 5, 6
